text:
[Verse]
Neon dreams light the night
Skyscrapers touch the sky
Our feet on the ground
But our heads fly high

[Verse 2]
Yellow cabs hustle by
Street sounds like a song
Crowds moving fast
We just move along

[Chorus]
City lights they shine so bright
In the dark we find our light
Hold my hand let's chase the night
Underneath the city lights

[Verse 3]
Billboards flash our names
In this concrete maze
Lost in the fame
But it's all just a game

[Chorus]
City lights they shine so bright
In the dark we find our light
Hold my hand let's chase the night
Underneath the city lights

[Bridge]
Starry nights oh so rare
But we don't really care
City lights up the sky
Where dreams never die
title: City Lights
